attributes.action: 3-day quarantine for fully vaccinated, returning to the UK from amber countries
attributes.additional_details: Because it is not fair. Other counties accept fully vaccinated people with no quarantine or other requirements.
attributes.background: To reduce the number of quarantine days from 10 to 3 for fully vaccinated people returning to UK from an amber country, or to remove the requirement for quarantine entirely.
